0.11.x.message: Moss version 0.11.12 contains mainly invisible changes that to improve performance and adds more functionality to the debugging panel (double-click on the version number in the bottom left to open the debugging panel).

Moss versions 0.11.9 and 0.11.10 contain a bug that prevents automatic updates from succeeding on macOS and Windows. To resolve the issue, manually download and install the latest version of Moss from https://theweave.social/moss
